hero.description: I'm an ML/AI Engineer & Backend Developer from Turkey. I create intelligent systems and robust backend solutions that make a difference.

whatido.title: What I Do
whatido.subtitle: I develop intelligent systems and robust backend solutions using modern technologies

service1.title: AI/ML Systems Development
service1.description: I develop machine learning models and intelligent systems using TensorFlow, PyTorch and scikit-learn.

service2.title: Backend API Development
service2.description: I create powerful, scalable and secure backend services with Django, Flask and ASP.NET Core.

service3.title: Data Analysis & Processing
service3.description: I analyze large datasets to develop business intelligence solutions and predictive models.

ai-specialization.title: AI Specialization Program
ai-specialization.description: Selected as one of 120 participants in the exclusive Synchronous Group for the AI Specialization Program. Engaged in basic training on algorithms, data structures, operating systems, and GPU-based parallel programming.

docker-workshop.title: Docker Workshop
docker-workshop.description: Comprehensive workshop program on Docker container technologies and microservice architectures.

akbank-bootcamp.title: Akbank Data Analysis Bootcamp
akbank-bootcamp.description: Intensive bootcamp program on data analysis, machine learning and Python programming.

akbank-bootcamp2.title: Akbank Advanced AI Bootcamp
akbank-bootcamp2.description: Comprehensive training program covering advanced artificial intelligence techniques, deep learning models, and big data processing methods.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Projects and experiences I have been involved in my professional career

solonport.description: I design intelligent container placement systems using Deep Q-Learning and meta-heuristic methods, developing them as scalable services and integrating them into the corporate ASP.NET Core infrastructure.

sistek.description: I developed LSTM-based time series models that predict monthly and annual material needs; containerized them with Docker and provided real-time predictions through a Flask-based web service.

darphane.description: I developed a PHP and MySQL-based web document management system; provided identity verification with MERNIS integration and established a request tracking infrastructure for certificate stamping processes.

education.description: I am studying in the Computer Engineering department, specializing in software development, algorithm design, data structures, and machine learning. I focus on AI/ML projects to enhance my academic achievements.
